text:
One of the freshest slice fish soup i ever had. Sound ridiculous, Yes you may have to try it to believe.
The portion is generous worth more than the price. If u have craving for authentic fish soup, do not miss this chance.

Tried the pork trotter vinegar. Price a bit steep but reasonable portion. Gravy is good with savoury vinegar taste and not too oily. Meat can be better if it is softer but overall itâ€™s good. Environment is old school mini coffeshop but pretty cooling with the wall mounted fans.
One of the best teochew-style fish soups in the west. The fish was tender and the chilli sauce was f a b ðŸ¤© hidden gem of Jurong
All the time fav !! Highly recomended for the fish soup and pig trottle. Reasonable price yet huge portion!
My favourite hidden spot for a thick fish soup. Yummmz!!
